name: Seated Leg Press
instructions: Sit with your back flat against the pad, feet hip-width on the platform. Push through your heels to extend legs without locking knees, then return under control.

name: Cable Lat Pulldown
instructions: Grip the bar wider than shoulder-width, pull bar down to upper chest by squeezing shoulder blades, then slowly let it rise back up.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing forward. Press weights overhead until arms are straight, then lower back to start.

name: Resistance Band Biceps Curl
instructions: Stand on the band, hold handles with palms up, curl hands toward shoulders keeping elbows stationary, then lower slowly.
